message.raw:
Disabled labscript auto initialisation for the moment.
This is necessary so that things importing BLACS tabs and runviewer classes
from labscript_devices don't trigger auto initialisation.

We will probably never re-enable auto-initialisation, and will instead
make a __main__.py here so that people can still use command line compilation
of their labscripts with:

python -m labscript myfile.py my_hdf_file.h5 --options

etc.

message:
Disabled labscript auto initialisation for the moment.
This is necessary so that things importing BLACS tabs and runviewer classes
from labscript_devices don't trigger auto initialisation.

We will probably never re-enable auto-initialisation, and will instead
make a __main__.py here so that people can still use command line compilation
of their labscripts with:

python -m labscript myfile.py my_hdf_file.h5 --options

etc.
